Content/Explore/Getting-Started/Supporte.title: System requirements
Content/Explore/Getting-Started/Supporte.content: Check the hardware and software requirements needed to run Caseware Cloud. Minimum system specifications and recommended configurations for optimal performance.

Content/Explore/Whats-New/Frequently-ask.title: Frequently asked questions
Content/Explore/Whats-New/Frequently-ask.content: Find answers to common questions about Caseware Cloud. Select from frequently asked questions, troubleshooting guides, feature explanations, and helpful tips for users. Browse through common issues and select the most relevant answers.

Content/Explore/Getting-Started/Get-tech.title: Get technical support
Content/Explore/Getting-Started/Get-tech.content: Learn how to get technical support for Caseware Cloud. Select Customer Support from the navigation menu, log support cases, view active incidents, and get help with technical issues. Contact information, support channels, and how to select the appropriate support options.

Content/Explore/Knowledge-Base/Knowledge.title: Troubleshooting
Content/Explore/Knowledge-Base/Knowledge.content: Comprehensive troubleshooting guide for Caseware Cloud. Solutions to common problems, error messages, and diagnostic steps.

Content/Explore/Whats-New/Deprecated-fea.title: Deprecated features
Content/Explore/Whats-New/Deprecated-fea.content: Information about deprecated features in Caseware Cloud. Migration guides, alternative solutions, and timeline for feature removal.

Content/Setup/Licenses/Close-a-CaseWare-.title: Close a Caseware Cloud account
Content/Setup/Licenses/Close-a-CaseWare-.content: Step-by-step guide to close a Caseware Cloud account. Account closure process, data backup, and important considerations.
